  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1952</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Tribute to Martin Luther King</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Tribut Martin Luther zum König</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un hommage au roi de Martin Luther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um tributo ao rei de Martin Luther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un tributo al re del Martin Luther</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας φόρος σε Martin Luther King</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un tributo al rey de Martin Luther</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for advanced English students where they research information about Martin Luther King, do language exercises and write on topics presented to them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">America</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Civics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für hochentwickelte 
englische Kursteilnehmer, in denen sie Informationen über Martin 
Luther König erforschen, Sprachenübungen tun und auf die Themen 
schreiben, die ihnen dargestellt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais avançés où ils recherchent des informations sur 
le roi de Martin Luther, font des exercices de langage et écrivent 
sur des sujets présentés à eux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses avançados onde pesquisam a informação sobre o 
rei de Martin Luther, fazem exercícios da língua e os escrevem nos 
tópicos apresentados a eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi avanzati in cui ricercano le informazioni sul re del 
Martin Luther, fanno le esercitazioni di linguaggio e scrivono sui 
soggetti presentati loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους προηγμένους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές όπου ερευνούν τις 
πληροφορίες για Martin Luther King, κάνουν τις γλωσσικές 
ασκήσεις και γράφουν στα θέματα που παρουσιάζονται σε τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses avanzados donde investigan la información sobre 
el rey de Martin Luther, hacen ejercicios del lenguaje y escriben en 
los asuntos presentados a ellos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerika</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
